Designing Cloning Experiment

Species

1. Drosophila melanogaster
2. Drosophila aurora
3. Drosophila bocci
4. Drosophila lacteicornis or (pectinifera, asahinai, rufa) - alternatively you could use all these species to design primers and use either aurora and triauraria.

Eve Striped 2 Region within the eve upstream enhancer


From Hare et al, 2008: http://journals.plos.org/plosgenetics/article?id=10.1371/journal.pgen.1000106


From Ludwig et al., 2005: http://journals.plos.org/plosbiology/article?id=10.1371%2Fjournal.pbio.0030093

In literature:

From Redfly: chr2R 9977762 9978245         eve-striped-2 
From Berman: chr2R 9977821 9978407       eve_stripe_2
From Ludwig: ch2R: 9977712 9978610          eve_striped_2
From NCBI: chr2R:9977712 9978509  even-skipped (eve) gene, stripe 2 enhancer region
From Bothma, 2014: 720-bp eve stripe 2 enhancer, located between –1.5 kb and –800 bp upstream of the eve transcription start (4, 19).    Look up.

[http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/nuccore/3258640/](http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/nuccore/3258640/)

    >gi|3258640|gb|AF042709.1|AF042709 Drosophila melanogaster even-skipped (eve) gene, stripe 2 enhancer region
    

In Ludwig et al, 2005 The eve from genbank is super similar to the region added in the swap rescue experiments in Ludwig et al., 2005, except the genbank has this additional tail: AGTGGCAAGTGGCCGGTTTGCTGGCCCAAAAGAGGAGGCACTATCCCGGTCCTGGTACAGTTGGTACGCTGGGAATGATTATATCATCATAATAAATGTTT. 

So need to find exactly where this is and run the workflow to obtain this in each montium species. 

A preliminary alignment is found here: /Users/iamciera/Dropbox/Research2/montium/data/pipeline_output_2/5.output_alignments/output_eve_stripe_2_withDmel.fa 

Find the chromosomal map region that corresponds to above sequence (genbank plus ludwig tail) and about 100bp up and downstream.  

ch2R: 9977712 - 9978610 (target)
ch2R: 9977762 - 9978660 (+50 on each side)

ch2R:9973764 - 9988651 (Whole region including eve, between “adam" and "eve”)

 Maybe make bed that corresponds to each of these regions. Also include the whole regions between apple and eve. 
 Make the alignment

I already designed degenerate primers for eve, now read through previous papers to see if the regions will be good.

Primers used for building the construct are atttgcggccgcCAAGAAGGCTTGCATGTGGG and cgggatccAACGAAGGCAGTTAGTTGTTGACTG.
